original_text: Now you need to escape from your problem. Your friend has got power over you. So you must be humble. Go quickly to him and ask him to forgive the debt.
korean_text: 내 아들아 네가 네 이웃의 손에 빠졌은즉 이같이 하라 너는 곧 가서 겸손히 네 이웃에게 간구하여 스스로 구원하되

sentences.original_text: Now you need to escape from your problem
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 당신은 당신의 문제에서 벗어나야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Your friend has got power over you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 친구가 당신에게 권력을 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: and ask him to forgive the debt
